survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Biodegradable Packaging in Food Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding the use of biodegradable packaging in food delivery services, focusing on environmental impact and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use food delivery services in a typical week?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use food delivery services in a typical week?

questions.question_text: How important is biodegradable packaging when choosing a food delivery service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for this question to gauge importance levels. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is biodegradable packaging when choosing a food delivery service?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your preference for biodegradable packaging in food delivery? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice responses. Ensure the options are comprehensive.

script.question_text: What factors influence your preference for biodegradable packaging in food delivery? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Have you ever paid extra for biodegradable packaging in food delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice responses. Include an option for 'Not sure'.

script.question_text: Have you ever paid extra for biodegradable packaging in food delivery services?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in biodegradable packaging for food delivery services?
questions.client_notes: This is an open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in biodegradable packaging for food delivery services?
